body.name: St. Ives Fresh Skin Face Scrub For Healthy Skin Apricot Exfoliating Face Wash With 100 percent Natural Exfoliants, 6 Ounce (Pack of 4)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 21 hrs 25 mins
features: St. Ives Fresh Skin Apricot Face Scrub deeply exfoliates and removes impurities for glowing skin
Made with 100 percent natural exfoliants, this exfoliating face scrub uses delicious apricots grown in various sunny destinations, including California
This facial scrub provides deep exfoliation to slough away dull skin and reveal glowing skin
Use this apricot face wash scrub to promote soft healthy skin, clearing away dullness for brighter skin
St. Ives exfoliating scrub is dermatologist-tested, paraben free, and non-comedogenic
St. Ives is America's No.1 brand for facial scrubs
body.description: Hello, glowing cheeks! From America's No.1 scrub brand, St. Ives Fresh Skin Apricot Face Scrub is a multiple award-winning skin care product. This face wash scrub contains natural walnut shell powder to deeply exfoliate and reveal clean, glowing skin. St. Ives face scrubs are made with 100 percent natural exfoliants, like walnut shell powder and apricot fruit extract, which are known to help leave skin feeling super soft and smooth. Use this exfoliating scrub 3‐4 times a week for refreshed, glowing skin. Apricots are our thing, so we know those deliciously fuzzy fruits well. Our apricots come from sun-drenched California and North Africa as juicy fruits from different crops, any time of year. Our walnuts are grown in orchards in California and harvested in the fall when the shells are milled into a fine powder, so they have specially rounded edges, which means a softer scrub. Just the way we like it. This gentle scrub is oil-free, paraben-free, dermatologist-tested, and non-comedogenic (meaning, it won’t clog pores). How to use: Dispense scrub onto fingertips and massage onto damp skin. Spread in small circular motions to wake your skin’s natural circulation. When you’re done, rinse and glow. For best results, use 3-4 times a week.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: At a Glance: Facial wash deeply exfoliates & removes impurities for glowing skin Made with 100% natural exfoliators* Our walnuts and apricots come from California and North Africa St. Ives Fresh Skin Face Scrub Apricot Face Scrub Deeply Exfoliates for Clean, Smooth, and Glowing Skin St. Ives Fresh Skin Face Scrub Apricot is America's favorite scrub brand. This multi-award-winning exfoliating scrub contains 100% natural walnut shell powder* to deeply exfoliate for clean, glowing skin. Natural exfoliants like walnut shell powder and apricot fruit extract help this face wash leave skin feeling super soft and smooth. This is a 3-4 time a week kind of a facial scrub for refreshed, glowing skin.

St. Ives: Get to Know Us! Want to know how to get glowing skin? You’ve come to the perfect place. Our products were all made to bring the joy of nature to your skin while making it glow- all without crossing into shiny skin territory (not cute). That’s why our entire lineup features 100% natural moisturizers, exfoliators, and extracts*! We also just really, really love apricots. Think of St. Ives as your go-to for great-smelling cleansers, lotions, masks, and body washes you can use on the daily to get glowing skin that feels super-hydrated and oh-so-silky smooth. Did we mention we’re America’s one of the top Scrub Brand**? * Claim based on the ingredients used in the manufacturing of the product. Note: For detailed ingredient list, please check the manufacturer website. ** Based on 52 week unit sales ending 7.30.16

The Science of Exfoliation Did you know your skin is constantly renewing itself? Basically, your body is always making new skin cells: while you sleep, while you eat, during class or morning status meetings at work - you get the point! However, the process isn’t perfect. Sometimes these old cells don’t flake off quickly enough; this build-up can leave you with a rough, dull, tired-looking complexion. Enter the exfoliating face scrub! Used correctly, these deep facial cleansers can help boost radiance by gently buffing away leftover dead skin cells. Properly exfoliated skin looks fresher, smoother, and downright glow-ier. Now go forth and exfoliate responsibly with one of our face scrubs, made with 100% natural facial exfoliators*!

How to Use 1. Squeeze a dime sized amount of St. Ives Acne Control Face Scrub Apricot onto your fingertips and massage into damp skin. Spread in small circular motions, applying gentle pressure to wake your skin’s natural circulation. 2. Work the face wash all over, right up to your hairline and onto the sides of your nose. 3. When you’re done, rinse and pat dry with a clean towel. Use the exfoliating facial scrub 3-4 times a week (depending on skin) for best results.

St. Ives Fresh Skin Face Scrub Apricot 6 oz St. Ives Acne Control Face Scrub Apricot 6 oz St. Ives Radiant Skin Face Scrub Pink Lemon and Mandarin Orange 6 oz St. Ives Gentle Smoothing Face Scrub and Mask Oatmeal 6 oz St. Ives Blackhead Clearing Face Scrub Green Tea 6 oz St. Ives Exfoliate & Nourish Oil Scrub Coconut 4.23 oz Gentle Exfoliation - - - ✓ - - Moderation Exfoliation - - ✓ - ✓ ✓ Deep Exfoliation ✓ ✓ - - - - Provides Instant Nourishment - - - - - ✓ Helps Fight or Prevent Acne - ✓ - - ✓ -

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like this scrub. It makes my face feel fresh and clean.

I've used this scrub for years and absolutely love it. I tried a few others just to see if one would feel even better, but nothing has come close to comparing yet. I like having it in smaller containers, too. The last time I bought this, I got a whole jar of it, and I had to always take out some to travel with. With these smaller containers, I can just throw one in my suitecase.
Non male, prezzo non proprio conveniente.

I have tried a number of face scrubs and I have found this one to be the best. It really does the job exfoliating my skin. I use it once per week and it really leaves my face nice and smooth. I have sensitive skin and I am allergic to a lot of products but not this one. Great price for a scrub that really works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Can’t believe it’s so good and so cheap! Will definitely buy again!
